info.name: TokyoTosho - Dark (Minimal)
info.description:
Colors are identical to style 22205.  Removed japanese title, IRC link, site description, site map links, time zones, news, submitter search, categories, and top searches.  Condensed spacing on torrent list.  Feedback is welcome.

Full size Main page: 
http://sadpanda.us/images/204505-8VZPS3X.png
info.additionalInfo:
2013 Sep 02: Removed bottom Google Custom Search, footer.  Removed h1 text "Tokyo Toshokan" as this just takes up space.
2011 Jun 20: Removed nukeDL links.
